description: Inverse Moebius transform applied twice to squares.
comments: Dirichlet convolution of A001157 and A000012. Dirichlet convolution of A000005 and A000290 (Jovovic formula). - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 03 2011
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} d^2*tau(n/d). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jul 31 2002Equals A134577 * [1, 2, 3,...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 02 2007
mathematica: f[n_] := Plus @@ DivisorSigma[2, Divisors[n]]; Array[f, 41] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 05 2010 *)
prog: (PARI) /* Dirichlet convolution of A001157, A000012 (Mathar): */a(n)=sumdiv(n, d, sigma(d,2))(PARI) /* Dirichlet convolution of A000005, A000290 (Mathar): */a(n)=sumdiv(n, d, d^2*sigma(n/d,0))
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
